about_the_game:
Crazy Battle Pets is a high degree of freedom of self-moving chess game.

Build your animal team from 200+ Animal team and defeat other opponents.

The game supports up to 64 people in the same room.

All core content is free: Everything that will affect the game's success can be purchased with free tokens,and the game can be played perfectly without charging money!

- rank mode

Play intense synchronous games with 7 others,Burn your intelligence,build the best teamIn the limited time for each round.

Eliminate all other players and win the championship!

- practice mode

Asynchronous multiplayer mode with unlimited time.

Improve your team in each battle, or try new ones

Win 10 games before you lose all your hearts!

- Uesr-defined mode

All the rules are up to you. The number of people, HP, time, and even the lineup are up to you in this room！

Enjoy your own match with up to 63 other players！

- Forest（default build）

The card set is ready to use initially, simple but not mediocre. All players can use, custom fair game of choice!

- Flower Fairy

Constantly accumulate flowers, summon extremely powerful flower fairy to fight for you!

- Cat Fairy

To disrupt the enemy's original shape, let your enemy unprepared!!!!

- Goblin

In features is getting gradually became the strongest team!

- User-define

Choose the cards you like, and create a unique deck that best suits your play style!

Use your brain, develop a new card construction, and let your opponents eyes open!

We also provide players with pre-set card group operation ideas and array cards, and will make star recommendations in the office.

So relax and have fun!

At present, the game is in the EA stage, and we will add more cute animals, costumes, props and so on to the zoo in the future.

Fast update, stay tuned!
detailed_description:
Join our community

Struggling to find someone to share your experience with?

Want to play with a lot of players?

Or looking for a partner to get stronger with?

If you need to contact us：

Customer service email：guoja@160.com


About the Game

Crazy Battle Pets is a high degree of freedom of self-moving chess game.

Build your animal team from 200+ Animal team and defeat other opponents.

The game supports up to 64 people in the same room.

All core content is free: Everything that will affect the game's success can be purchased with free tokens,and the game can be played perfectly without charging money!

- rank mode

Play intense synchronous games with 7 others,Burn your intelligence,build the best teamIn the limited time for each round.

Eliminate all other players and win the championship!

- practice mode

Asynchronous multiplayer mode with unlimited time.

Improve your team in each battle, or try new ones

Win 10 games before you lose all your hearts!

- Uesr-defined mode

All the rules are up to you. The number of people, HP, time, and even the lineup are up to you in this room！

Enjoy your own match with up to 63 other players！

- Forest（default build）

The card set is ready to use initially, simple but not mediocre. All players can use, custom fair game of choice!

- Flower Fairy

Constantly accumulate flowers, summon extremely powerful flower fairy to fight for you!

- Cat Fairy

To disrupt the enemy's original shape, let your enemy unprepared!!!!

- Goblin

In features is getting gradually became the strongest team!

- User-define

Choose the cards you like, and create a unique deck that best suits your play style!

Use your brain, develop a new card construction, and let your opponents eyes open!

name: Crazy Battle Pets

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Additional Notes:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP SP2+

short_description: Form your own team among 200+ different animals and then fight with other players! Play a game in a relaxed and pleasant atmosphere, and enjoy the game without any operations. They strengthen the animals in battle after battle until they finally win the championship.
